seeking_wisdom.characterSays: Wisdom by imitation is easy; Wisdom by reflection is noble; Wisdom by experience is forever.

seeking_story.characterSays: It is a very long story.

story_part_a.characterSays: Dragons were conjured to be the ultimate Weapon in the War of Revival. Massive flying fire breathing creatures with impenetrable skin.

story_part_b.characterSays: But their mistake was also making us intelligent. Ultimately, it was a dragon who killed the sole person capable of conjuring Dragons with magic.

story_part_c.characterSays: After the Revival, humans turned their armies towards the dragons of the land. They claimed we were destroying villages. The real motivation was greed and pride.

story_part_d.characterSays: We were driven west. I refused to be pushed any further. I decided to use their greed and pride against them. I became a lender.

story_part_e.characterSays: All the gold in this room started from the small pouch left by a fleeing nobleman.

story_part_f.characterSays: I swore to one day use my wealth to punish humans for what they did, and continue to do.

story_part_g.characterSays: However, you don't know humans until you've gone into business with them...

story_part_h.characterSays: Each human, rich or poor, are victims of circumstance, and are their own endless sources of suffering.

story_part_i.characterSays: And so, I have no vendetta to conclude, yet no desire to deliver them from their self inflected injuries.

story_part_j.characterSays: I have no purpose, and so I continue to grow my wealth and power, preparing for the day when my purpose is revealed.

responses.text: I want to hear your story

story_response_good.characterSays: I've told it so many times, the words have lost all meaning.

responses.text: I want to hear your story

story_response_boring.characterSays: To be honest, I'd rather forget it all.
